The species is capable of denitrification, which is the process of converting nitrate to nitrogen gas under anoxic conditions.

Castellaniella ginsengisoli has been found to exhibit plant growth-promoting properties, such as the production of indole-3-acetic acid (IAA), a phytohormone that can stimulate plant growth and development.
